content.question: Opponents of Eisenhowerâ€™s decision in the excerpt most likely held views similar to which of the following earlier groups?

choices.label: Radical Republicans in Congress in the 1870s

New Deal Democrats in the North in the 1930s and 1940s

content.answer: Southern state leaders in the 1880s and 1890s

topic.text: 8.6: Early Steps in the Civil Rights Movement (1940s and 1950s)
